name: Fetch customer channel information with invalid Data i.e. cifKey too short

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930709001770"
When I fetch the channel information for CIF Key: "123456789012345678"

children.description: Get customer channel info using http get: 123456789012345678

testSteps.description: Then I should receive an Forbidden Error

userStory.storyName: Fetch the channel information for a customer

title: Fetch customer channel information with invalid Data i.e. cifKey too short

tags.name: Fetch the channel information for a customer
